com.oracle.tools.deferred
Class DeferredAssert

java.lang.Object
  com.oracle.tools.deferred.DeferredAssert

public class DeferredAssert
extends Object

The DeferredAssert is a helper class that defines commonly used "assertThat" methods for the purposes of unit, functional and integration testing.

Copyright (c) 2012-2013. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Author:
Brian Oliver

<T> void
assertThat(Deferred<T> deferred, org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher)

Type Parameters:

Parameters:

matcher - the Matcher

AssertionError - if the assertion fails

assertThat

public static <T> void assertThat(Deferred<T> deferred,
                                  org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher,
                                  long retryDelayDuration,
                                  TimeUnit retryDelayDurationUnits,
                                  long totalRetryDuration,
                                  TimeUnit totalRetryDurationUnits)
                       throws AssertionError
Asserts that a Deferred, when it becomes available, will eventually (after the specified amount of time) satisfy the specified Matcher.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of value produced by the Deferred
Parameters:
deferred - the Deferred
matcher - the Matcher
retryDelayDuration - the time to wait between retrying
retryDelayDurationUnits - the TimeUnits for the retry delay duration
totalRetryDuration - the maximum duration for retrying
totalRetryDurationUnits - the TimeUnits for the duration
Throws:
AssertionError - if the assertion fails

assertThat

public static <T> void assertThat(String message,
                                  Deferred<T> deferred,
                                  org.hamcrest.Matcher<?> matcher,
                                  long retryDelayDuration,
                                  TimeUnit retryDelayDurationUnits,
                                  long totalRetryDuration,
                                  TimeUnit totalRetryDurationUnits)
                       throws AssertionError
Asserts that a Deferred, when it becomes available, will eventually (after the specified amount of time) satisfy the specified Matcher.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of value produced by the Deferred
Parameters:

deferred - the Deferred
matcher - the Matcher
retryDelayDuration - the time to wait between retrying
retryDelayDurationUnits - the TimeUnits for the retry delay duration
totalRetryDuration - the maximum duration for retrying

Throws:
AssertionError - if the assertion fails
